WorkItem.Description:
I configured Symantec Endpoint for deployment via WSUS Package Publisher, everything worked fine but when I came back a few hours later the update is missing under the programs Updates directory. I see my Adobe packages but not the Symantec. I log into the WSUS console and I see them there. Please advise. 

It would be hard to manage if the patches keep disappearing like that. 

WSUS - Server 2k12 datacenter. 
WSUS Package Publisher installed on local server. 
Able to push and successfully install packages. 

Thanks, 
Gary

Comments.Message:
Can you please post a screenshot? Where are you not seeing the Symantec update? Within WPP or within WSUS Console?

Regards
Norbert
